badges.🏆: :trophy:  `Meilleur joueur au moment du reset de la 1.0`

badges.🌟: :star2:  `Personne ayant aidé à mettre le bot sur un serv de plus de 2000 membres`
badges.🎗️: :reminder_ribbon:  `Personne ayant dominé un classement de la semaine`
badges.🎄: :christmas_tree:  `Badge pouvant être gagné chaque noël lors d'un concours`
badges.🗳️: :ballot_box:  `Personne ayant voté dans les 12 dernières heures`
badges.🔖: :bookmark:  `Adopteur de classes de la première heure`

en.commandDescription: Displays the profile of a player.
en.optionUserDescription: The player whose profile you want to display.
en.optionRankDescription: The rank of the player whose profile you want to display.
en.title: {effect} | {pseudo} | Level {level}

badges.🏆: :trophy:  `Best player by rank when resetting to 1.0.`
badges.🏅: :medal:  `Player in the top 10 by rank before the 1.0 reset.`
badges.🥚: :egg:  `People who found all of the bot's easter eggs`
badges.❤️: :heart:  `User who has the Support role on the bot server`
badges.🍀: :four_leaf_clover:  `Badge that can be won from time to time in contests on the bot official server or on Twitter`
badges.🎰: :slot_machine:  `Badge given in a completely random way`
badges.⛑️: :helmet_with_cross:  `People who are one of the 20 first members of the bot server`
badges.🥇: :first_place:  `People who reached first place rank after resetting`
badges.🌟: :star2:  `People who helped put the bot on a server of over 2000 members`
badges.🎄: :christmas_tree:  `This badge can be win on giveaway every christmas`
badges.🗳️: :ballot_box:  `Person who voted in the last 12 hours`
badges.💞: :revolving_hearts:  `A player that raised a legendary pet`
